        'The Splitter component generates pane-based layouts that can be adjusted, enlarged, and minimized as needed.',
    description:
        'Splitter component can be useful for empowering users where there is a need to manage the dimensions of multiple content panes within a layout.',
}

```tsx
import { Splitter, SplitterContent } from "@fold-ui/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => (<Splitter snap width="100%" height={300} start={0.5} direction="horizontal">
        <SplitterContent style={{
        backgroundSize: '700px auto',
        background: 'url(/photos/01.jpg) no-repeat center left',
    }}/>
        <SplitterContent style={{
        backgroundSize: '700px auto',
        background: 'url(/photos/02.jpg) no-repeat center right',
    }}/>
    </Splitter>);

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => (
    <Splitter
        snap
        width="100%"
        height={300}
        start={0.5}
        direction="horizontal">
        <SplitterContent
            style={{
                backgroundSize: '700px auto',
                background: 'url(/photos/01.jpg) no-repeat center left',
            }}
        />
        <SplitterContent
            style={{
                backgroundSize: '700px auto',
                background: 'url(/photos/02.jpg) no-repeat center right',
            }}
        />
    </Splitter>
)
```
### Nested

> The Splitter component can also be used to create nested layouts, which are useful in applications where space is limited.

export const Nested = () => (<Splitter width="100%" height={300} start={0.25} direction="horizontal">
        <SplitterContent row bgToken="surface-strongest">
            <Text>Left</Text>
        </SplitterContent>
        <SplitterContent row>
            <Splitter width="100%" height={300} start={0.75} handle={<Pill>Drag</Pill>} direction="vertical">
                <SplitterContent row bgToken="surface-stronger">
                    <Text>Top</Text>
                </SplitterContent>
                <SplitterContent row bgToken="surface-strong">
                    <Text>Bottom</Text>
                </SplitterContent>
            </Splitter>
        </SplitterContent>
    </Splitter>);

<div className="story-block">
<Nested />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Nested.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Nested = () => (
    <Splitter
        width="100%"
        height={300}
        start={0.25}
        direction="horizontal">
        <SplitterContent
            row
            bgToken="surface-strongest">
            <Text>Left</Text>
        </SplitterContent>
        <SplitterContent row>
            <Splitter
                width="100%"
                height={300}
                start={0.75}
                handle={<Pill>Drag</Pill>}
                direction="vertical">
                <SplitterContent
                    row
                    bgToken="surface-stronger">
                    <Text>Top</Text>
                </SplitterContent>
                <SplitterContent
                    row
                    bgToken="surface-strong">
                    <Text>Bottom</Text>
                </SplitterContent>
            </Splitter>
        </SplitterContent>
    </Splitter>
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
